analysis.name: murderparty
analysis.description: A 3D game project developed using the Godot Engine.
achievements: Developed core game mechanics and implemented essential game systems within a 3D environment.
Designed and constructed game levels, incorporating 3D models, textures, and materials to create an immersive player experience.
Utilized the Godot Engine's features for scene management, animation, and physics to build the game's interactive elements.
Integrated 3D models, including GLB and PNG files, and implemented necessary import settings for compatibility within the Godot environment.
Implemented custom shaders to achieve specific visual effects, enhancing the game's aesthetic appeal.
key_features: Scene Management: Utilizes Godot's efficient scene management system to organize and structure the game's visual components and logic.
Model Integration: Demonstrates the successful import and integration of 3D models (GLB format), enabling the creation of complex visual assets.
Texture Utilization: Includes textures to provide detailed surface features and designs on 3D models and world objects.
Shader Implementation: Custom shader files were included to provide customized visual effects.
Level Design and Asset Creation: Includes map, model, material directories to demonstrate 3D environment design and asset creation using Godot.
